[center][b]-Features-[/b] Better combat system Player Attack & Follow clipping Most Exploits fixed Cheat Client Patched Hyperion Core New hp bars/fading/x10 toggle Clan chats 100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded. 100% Switching Auth code vote system Vote point shop & Pk Point shop All Pking spots in mage book teleport. quest tab pk information. Titles Correct food & Pot delay Everything needed for a pk server. Amazing features added to pking to make the experience funner[/center]
[center][img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/tavern/random.png[/img] [img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/tavern/agsspec.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/tavern/Dclaws.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/tavern/shop.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/qt-1.png[/img] [img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/qt2.png[/img][/center]
